commandDescription: Merge back csv files into permissionsets
sfXmlFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for input csv files. Default: '%s'
esCsvFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for output permissionsets. Default: '%s'
inputFlagDescription: Specify a permissionset dir in input. Example: MyPermissionSet
sortFlagDescription: Specify if split results must be sorted. Default '%s'
